name: portworx-nifi
description: Apache NiFi backed by Portworx volumes
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 2 agent nodes each with: 1.1 CPU | 2048 MB MEM | 6 1000 MB Disk
Portworx should be installed on the Private Agents to be able to provision volumes.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache NiFi is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/nifi
	Issues: Issues: support@portworx.com
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache NiFi is being uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
